channel.title: vscode on carakan
channel.description: Recent content in vscode on carakan

item.title: “NewRailscasts” My first VScode Theme
item.description: I ported my adaption of the ancient railscasts theme for (neo)vim to VSCode, its solarized, supports very well javascript, typescript, ruby and elixir, here’s some screenshots: TypeScript Html + erb Elixir If you like try to install only follow this link or search in Extensions “New Railscasts”, also if you use vim you can install the new-railscasts from my repo.
